message.name: ERR_RNFE_RATE_CELL_RULE_OBJECT
message.locale: No rule object found for rate in rate table '%1c' in row '%2c' and column '%3c'.

message.name: ERR_MRE_RATE_CELL_RULE_OBJECT
message.locale: More than one rule object found for rate in rate table '%1c' in row '%2c' and column '%3c'.

message.name: ERR_MRE_RATE_CELL
message.locale: A rate table cell for row type '%1c' and column type '%2c' exists more than once in rate header '%3n' for rate table type '%4c'.

message.name: INF_PROCESSING_RATE_TABLE_HEADER
message.locale: Processing rate table header with ID '%1n' (effective from %2d) for rate table '%3c'...

message.name: INF_RATE_CELL_RULE_OBJECT_REMOVING
message.locale: There is no rate cell for rate table '%1c' in row '%2c' and column '%3c' - removing existing rule object...

message.name: INF_RATE_CELL_RULE_OBJECT_CREATING
message.locale: Creating a new rule object for rate table '%1c' in row '%2c' and column '%3c'...

message.name: INF_RATE_CELL_RULE_OBJECT_MODIFYING
message.locale: The existing rule object for rate table '%1c' in row '%2c' and column '%3c' will be modified to change its value from %4s to %5s...

message.name: INF_RATE_CELL_RULE_OBJECT_SKIPPED
message.locale: The existing rule object for rate table '%1c' in row '%2c' and column '%3c' is unchanged - its value remains as %4s.

message.name: INF_PROPAGATE_RATES_PENDING
message.locale: Updated rates have yet to be applied to C\u00FAram Express Rules.
